title: Analyst

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, you may attempt to hack a node. The chance of success is increased depending on how many people attempt to hack the node.
- Twice per game, you may learn all astral visits made that night. You do not learn regular visits.
- Learn 3 REF roles that might be present from a hacked node OR learn 3 players that might be an REF from a hacked node, you may only access each node for either purpose twice.
- You may roleblock another player
- You may visit another player, learning if they can access nodes

desc:
Post 2170
*You love math and statistics. You made that your career before joining up with NETSEC.*
